about_the_game:
Soundtrack for The Last Birdling. After purchasing and downloading the soundtrack, players will be able to listen to the tracks using Steam's music player.

Composer: Efe Tozan

Tracks list:
1. The Last Birdling
2. Menu
3. Forest
4. Bimonia
5. Village
6. Tayo
7. Airin
8. Action
9. Uneasy
10. Terror
11. Mellow
12. Peace
13. Friendship
14. Castle
15. Snow
16. Vi
17. Sadness
18. Finale
19. Climax

Thank you for supporting The Last Birdling!
